options.content:
Condicións Atmosféricas
Humidade e Temperatura

targets.query:
from(bucket: "meteoloradb")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nodo_feria")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "humedad")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "meteoloradb")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nodo_feria")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "radsolar")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "meteoloradb")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nodo_feria")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uv")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "meteoloradb")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nodo_feria")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temperatura")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
